title: Breville 800-CPXL Die Cast Citrus Press - Breville at Abt Electronics
description:
Buy Now - http://www.abt.com/product/22197/Breville-800CPXL.html
Shop Juicers - http://www.abt.com/category/682/Juicers.html

Breville Stainless Steel Die Cast Citrus Press Model 800CPXL
The Breville 800 CPXL is a stylish way to get fresh-squeezed juice quickly and easily. It takes approximately 4 seconds to juice each fruit half with very little effort. When juicing is complete simply close the drip stop spout lower the arm and eject the fruit peel. The whole assembly can be removed as one piece and taken to the sink or dishwasher. The Innovative Quadra-Fin™ cone maximizes extraction of all citrus fruits from limes to grapefruits. Makes juicing easy with innovative active-arm press -- a power-assisted lever that makes it effortless to press fruits. Acid-resistant die-cast cone ensures a lifetime of fresh citrus.
Specifications:
• Materials: Professional grade die cast metals reinforced stainless steel
• Functionality: High yield pressing of all sized citrus friuts
• Motor: Industrial strength whisper-quiet motor
• To clean: Wipe clean with damp cloth; dishwasher-safe parts
• Key Features
o Revolutionary active-arm press with soft grip handle
o Multi-tiered Quadra-Fin juicing cone
o Drip stop juice spout
o 2 Stainless steel filters for variable pulp control
• Accessories: Dust cover plate
• Volts/Watts: 100 watts
• Material: Stainless steel
